# calendar

A simple calender API

developed in typescript, getting ready to test & launch to npm registry in a beta state 

```js
const {getMonthMeta} = require('@whilethiscompiles/calendar')
getMonthMeta(2012) // {december:{daysInMonth:31,formattedMonthName:'December',dateList:{'1':'2012-12-01','2':'2012-12-02','3':'2012-12-03','4':'2012-12-04','5':'2012-12-05','6':'2012-12-06','7':'2012-12-07','8':'2012-12-08','9':'2012-12-09','10':'2012-12-10','11':'2012-12-11','12':'2012-12-12','13':'2012-12-13','14':'2012-12-14','15':'2012-12-15','16':'2012-12-16','17':'2012-12-17','18':'2012-12-18','19':'2012-12-19','20':'2012-12-20','21':'2012-12-21','22':'2012-12-22','23':'2012-12-23','24':'2012-12-24','25':'2012-12-25','26':'2012-12-26','27':'2012-12-27','28':'2012-12-28','29':'2012-12-29','30':'2012-12-30','31':'2012-12-31'}},november:{daysInMonth:30,formattedMonthName:'November',dateList:{'1':'2012-11-01','2':'2012-11-02','3':'2012-11-03','4':'2012-11-04','5':'2012-11-05','6':'2012-11-06','7':'2012-11-07','8':'2012-11-08','9':'2012-11-09','10':'2012-11-10','11':'2012-11-11','12':'2012-11-12','13':'2012-11-13','14':'2012-11-14','15':'2012-11-15','16':'2012-11-16','17':'2012-11-17','18':'2012-11-18','19':'2012-11-19','20':'2012-11-20','21':'2012-11-21','22':'2012-11-22','23':'2012-11-23','24':'2012-11-24','25':'2012-11-25','26':'2012-11-26','27':'2012-11-27','28':'2012-11-28','29':'2012-11-29','30':'2012-11-30'}},october:{daysInMonth:31,formattedMonthName:'October',dateList:{'1':'2012-10-01','2':'2012-10-02','3':'2012-10-03','4':'2012-10-04','5':'2012-10-05','6':'2012-10-06','7':'2012-10-07','8':'2012-10-08','9':'2012-10-09','10':'2012-10-10','11':'2012-10-11','12':'2012-10-12','13':'2012-10-13','14':'2012-10-14','15':'2012-10-15','16':'2012-10-16','17':'2012-10-17','18':'2012-10-18','19':'2012-10-19','20':'2012-10-20','21':'2012-10-21','22':'2012-10-22','23':'2012-10-23','24':'2012-10-24','25':'2012-10-25','26':'2012-10-26','27':'2012-10-27','28':'2012-10-28','29':'2012-10-29','30':'2012-10-30','31':'2012-10-31'}},september:{daysInMonth:30,formattedMonthName:'September',dateList:{'1':'2012-9-01','2':'2012-9-02','3':'2012-9-03','4':'2012-9-04','5':'2012-9-05','6':'2012-9-06','7':'201
```
